response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its high value and quality, I understand it's worth $12,000 to you. To ensure we both benefit from this transaction, I propose a special introductory price of $10,800. This represents an exceptional opportunity for you to acquire the product at a significant discount. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 10800}
